content.html: Elon Musk quickly deleted a tweet saying legacy verified accounts would not lose their checkmarks on April 1 as he previously said, won’t happen for another “few weeks” however, if they specifically say they won’t pay for Twitter Blue, then Twitter will remove their checkmark
content.value:
Elon Musk quickly deleted a tweet saying legacy verified accounts would not lose their checkmarks on April 1 as he previously said, won’t happen for another “few weeks”

however, if they specifically say they won’t pay for Twitter Blue, then Twitter will remove their checkmark
